text: Sailing at the 2005 Southeast Asian Games logo Sailing at the 2005 Southeast Asian Games took place at the Subic Bay Yacht Club, Subic Bay Freeport Zone, Zambales, Philippines. Twelve gold medals were contested. The event was scheduled to be held from November 26 to December 4, but wind conditions led to the organisers bringing the races forward to conclude the events by December 2. ==Medal table by country==
